item.title: Chillwitm888's Anime Sketchbook The responses are (NSFW)
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:28, topic:428613”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=531301.msg3881754#msg3881754 date=1326076158]

Well first of all the eyes on the 2nd one are way to thick. Think of original eyes, they are narrow (For males, otherwise, well ya know).
The last picture, you can really try shading, and work on the mouth. For the one at the top, I suggest not trying to illustrate such glare. It really gives the picture an odd tinge to it.

I can’t believe i missed this comment,
yeah thanks for the tip, will do
[/quote]

I can believe it. There is so much spam on this topic. Lol[/quote]
Lol, it’s funny though xD

this is one of my drawings outlined
